helpText: é_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________È.

generic.title: é_Error updating categories__________________________È
generic.message: é_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________È.

maxDepthExceeded.title: é_Error updating categories__________________________È
maxDepthExceeded.message: é_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________È.

destinationHasSameName.title: é_Error updating categories__________________________È
destinationHasSameName.message: é_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________È.

noSchema.title: é_Schema not found_________________È
noSchema.message: é_Item schema not found for user_________________È.

maxCharacter.title: é_Error updating categories__________________________È
maxCharacter.message: é_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________È.

deleteInUseCategory.title: é_Delete category________________È
deleteInUseCategory.message: é_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________È.

custom.title: é_Custom categories__________________È
custom.message: é_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________È.

arcgis.title: é_ArcGIS categories__________________È
arcgis.message: é_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________È.

iso.title: é_ISO categories_______________È
iso.message: é_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________È.

inspire.title: é_INSPIRE categories___________________È
inspire.message: é_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________È.
